price: Kuma lalle haƙĩƙa Mun bai wa Luƙmãn hikima. (Muka ce masa) Ka gõde wa Allah, kuma wanda ya gõde, to yanã gõdẽwa ne dõmin kansa kawai kuma wanda ya kãfirta, to, lalle, Allah Mawadãci ne, Gõdadde.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا لُقۡمَٰنَ ٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ أَنِ ٱشۡكُرۡ لِلَّهِۚ وَمَن يَشۡكُرۡ فَإِنَّمَا يَشۡكُرُ لِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَنِيٌّ حَمِيدٞ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
